title: ReduceLRonPlateau | RuntimeError: value cannot be converted to type double without overflow: inf
body_html:
Hi,

So i am doing the following:
from torch.optim.lr_scheduler import ReduceLROnPlateau as RedLR
...
scheduler = RedLR(optimizer, 'min', factor=0.5, patience=5, verbose=True)
... After the first epoch :
scheduler.step(Variable((torch.from_numpy(mean_epoch_loss)))

I receive the following error:
RuntimeError: value cannot be converted to type double without overflow: inf

My pytorch version is:
torch.__version__
'0.3.0.post4'

mean_epoch_loss (is a autograd.Variable) stays on positive values between [0, 2] and the training
runs normally without the scheduler.step.

Any help on this one?

Thanks!
